abstract: Kraft is getting experimental with an application for the Apple iPad.
snippet: Kraft is getting experimental with an application for the Apple iPad.
lead_paragraph: Among the mainstream packaged-goods marketers, Kraft Foods is among the most adventurous in trying out new ways to reach consumers like social media. Now, Kraft is getting all experimental again with an application for the Apple iPad.

headline.main: Maybe One iPad Recipe Begins, ‘Dip Apple in Kraft Caramels’
